description: This file defines a Flutter widget called AppShell, which manages the main navigation structure of the app using a bottom NavigationBar. It switches between three screens: StoreScreen, LibraryScreen, and PlayerScreen, and handles state management for the selected tab.

classes.name: AppShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that acts as the main shell for navigating between different screens of the app.

classes.name: _AppShellState
classes.description: The state class for AppShell, managing the selected index for navigation and switching between screens.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for AppShell, including Scaffold, AnimatedSwitcher, and NavigationBar.

methods.name: onDestinationSelected
methods.description: Callback to update the selected index when the user taps a navigation destination.
